mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(m1.pro_mem_no) AS count FROM pro_mem m1 INNER JOIN (SELECT pro_no FROM pro_mem WHERE id = #{id}) m2 ON m1.pro_no = m2.pro_no WHERE pro_parti_check = 'Y' AND m1.pro_no = #{proNo} GROUP BY m1.pro_no

SELECT i.name, m.id, u.profile_img, i.rank, d.dept_name FROM pro_mem m JOIN users u ON(m.id = u.id) JOIN user_info i ON(u.emp_no = i.emp_no) JOIN departments d ON(i.dept_no = d.dept_no) WHERE m.pro_no = #{proNo} AND m.pro_parti_check = 'Y' ORDER BY i.name
SELECT work_group_no, work_group_name, work_group_seq, pro_no FROM work_group WHERE pro_no = #{proNo} ORDER BY work_group_name

SELECT a.pro_post_no, a.post_type, a. post_title, TO_CHAR(a.post_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS postDate, a.id, j.profile_img, k.name, b.writing_no, b.writing_content, c.work_no, c.work_status, c.work_pri, c.work_start_day, c.work_start_time, c.work_end_day, c.work_end_time, c.lr_work_seq, c.work_content, f.sch_no, f.sch_start_day, f.sch_start_time, f.sch_end_day, f.sch_end_time, f.sch_place, f.sch_content, i.vote_no, i.vote_content, i.vote_end_day, i.vote_end_check, e.work_group_no FROM pro_post a LEFT JOIN pro_writing b ON(a.pro_post_no = b.pro_post_no) LEFT JOIN pro_work c ON(a.pro_post_no = c.pro_post_no) LEFT JOIN work_group e ON(c.work_group_no = e.work_group_no) LEFT JOIN pro_sch f ON(a.pro_post_no = f.pro_post_no) LEFT JOIN vote i ON(a.pro_post_no = i.pro_post_no) INNER JOIN users j ON(a.id = j.id) INNER JOIN user_info k ON(j.emp_no = k.emp_no) WHERE (f.personal_sch = 'N' or f.personal_sch IS NULL) AND a.pro_no = #{proNo} ORDER BY pro_post_no DESC

SELECT a.com_no, a.com_content, TO_CHAR(a.com_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd HH24:mi') AS comDate, c.name, b.profile_img, a.id, p.pro_post_no FROM com a JOIN users b ON(a.id=b.id) JOIN user_info c ON(b.emp_no = c.emp_no) JOIN pro_post p ON(a.pro_post_no = p.pro_post_no) WHERE a.com_no IN (SELECT com_no FROM com WHERE pro_post_no IN (SELECT pro_post_no FROM pro_post WHERE pro_no = #{proNo}))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO com(com_no, pro_post_no, com_content, id) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(com_no), 0) +1 FROM com), #{proPostNo}, #{comContent}, #{id} )
